info.description: The purpose of this rest API is to make the connection between the frontoffice and backoffice of the bookstore project.
info.title: Store API

tags.name: Clients
tags.description: Basic functionalities available to the client

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Check the client information and return the token auth

400.description: The email or password was not received or the client was only a registered in the store (in other words, doesn't have a password already)

500.description: The client doesn't exist or ocorred a error trying to search the client. Also, the password inserted can be wrong.

get.description: Return all books present on the database

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database search process.

get.description: Return a book with the ISBN sended

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: ISBN of the book to be searched

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database search process or the ISBN doesn't correspond any book on the database.

post.description: Add a review of a book

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The new review of a book

200.description: The review was inserted on database.

400.description:
The answer obtained is self explanatory.

An error while registering a book review can occur because: was receveid a invalid token, the rate is invalid, the description of review or the isbn book wasn't received, occurred a error during database operations, the NIF of client was invalid, the isbn doesn't match any book on the database.

Each error has a specific code, was shown in the next example.

message.example: The isbn do not corresponds to any book

post.description: Insert a new client into the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The client to be inserted on the database

200.description: The client was inserted on database.

400.description: The password of the client was not received or a error occured trying to add the information to the database. An example of that:

post.summary: Complete a registration of a client
post.description: Integrate a client that was already registered in the physical store, to make sure that he has access to the website

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The email of client and the password that should be used to acess the website

200.description: The client was now a password associated with his account.

400.description: The email is not associated with any client in the database.

message.example: Email is not associated to anyone

500.description:
The answer obtained is self explanatory.

A error can occur because the password or email of the client was not received, or a error occured trying to add the information to the database or if the client was already a password.

All the errors have a code and a message, as you can see:

message.example: Client already have a password associated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The updated information of the client

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database when trying to edit the existing data.

message.example: Ocorred a error trying to edit the client

post.summary: Get the client information by token

400.description:
Was occurred an error in the database when trying search to the client, or the token was not received, was expired or was ocorred an error trying to decoding.

The errors are always explicitly as showed on the follow example:

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The Name and Email of the client that want to join the newsletter service

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database trying to add the user to the newsletter list

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The email of the client that want the unsubscribe the newsletter

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database trying to delete the user from the newsletter list

post.description: This topic, 'Purchases', is from the store perspective. Purchases should be understood as the sells that the client made to the store.

200.description: Return the purchases and purchases requests that the client made

400.description:
Was occurred an error in the database when trying search to the client, or the token was not received, was expired or was ocorred an error trying to decoding.

The errors are always explicitly as showed on the follow example:

500.description: Was occurred an error in the database when trying search the purchases of client

post.summary: Make a request of a purchase
post.description: This topic, 'Purchases', is from the store perspective. Purchases should be understood as the sells that the client made to the store.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The purchase information that is gonna be requested

400.description: The answer obtained is self explanatory. An error can occour for multiple reasons and the reasons are explained in the JSON answer. An example of error writing the request on the database:

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The token of client and the id of purchase request

200.description: The filepath of the pdf generated

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database trying to search the purchase or in the pdf generation

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The token of client and the id of purchase

200.description: The filepath of the pdf generated

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database trying to search the purchase or in the pdf generation

post.description: This topic, 'Sales', is from the store perspective. Sales should be understood as the purchases that the client made in the store.

200.description: Return sales that the client made

400.description:
Was occurred an error in the database when trying search to the client, or the token was not received, was expired or was ocorred an error trying to decoding.

The errors are always explicitly as showed on the follow example:

500.description: Was occurred an error in the database when trying search the sales of client

post.description: This topic, 'Sales', is from the store perspective. Sales should be understood as the purchases that the client made in the store.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The token of client and the id of sale

200.description: The filepath of the pdf generated

400.description: Was occurred an error in the database trying to search the sale or in the pdf generation

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The purchase information that is gonna be requested

ISBN.description: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) is a numeric commercial book identifier that is intended to be unique. We accept the ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 format.

staticUrl.decription: The url of the image book

type.decription: The type of image for multer purposes

nif.description: NIF of client who made the review

name.description: Name of client who made the review

dob.description: The date of birth should be on formatt: YYYY-MM-DD

cellPhone.description: The cellphone should correspond a portuguese number

zip.description: The zip code of client shoudl be on formatt: XXXX-YYY
